rooms.description: Open-plan area connecting the entrance to kitchen and living space. Features a Brutalist aesthetic with exposed concrete structures.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Minimalist design with raw materials adhering to Vastu principles by situating it in the southeast direction for prosperity.
Dedicated library space designed with ample shelving and natural light. Located on the northern side of the villa for enhanced energy flow according to Vastu guidelines.
